data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Guipúzcoa.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Guipúzcoa, País Vasco, Spain

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Guipúzcoa you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Guipúzcoa, País Vasco, Spain a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 534,274 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Donostia / San Sebastián
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Donostia / San Sebastián, País Vasco, Spain.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Guipúzcoa, País Vasco, Spain.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 11,300 believers in Guipúzcoa against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who are far from you in Guipúzcoa. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Guipúzcoa
location.cities_list: Donostia / San Sebastián, Irun, Errenteria, Eibar, Zarautz
location.cities_list_w_pop: Donostia / San Sebastián (185,357), Irun (60,951), Errenteria (38,767), Eibar (27,419), Zarautz (22,627)
